data.name: sqlMovimientos.SelectCommand
data.value:
;WITH items AS ( select * from te_tiquetes c where c.Fecha >= @fi and c.Fecha <= @ff and c.Cancelada = 0 and c.Idusuario = @iduaurio and c.Caja = @caja )
select c.Caja, MovInicial = (select top 1 Numerofactura from items order by Id asc) , MovFinal = (select top 1 Numerofactura from items order by Id desc), count(*) Transacciones, Sum(c.Valorpagado) Venta from items c group by c.Caja

data.name: sqlDevoluciones.SelectCommand
data.value:
;WITH items AS ( select * from te_tiquetes c where c.Fecha >= @fi and c.Fecha <= @ff and c.Cancelada = 1 and c.Idusuario = @iduaurio and c.Caja = @caja )
select c.Caja, count(*) Transacciones, Sum(c.Valorpagado) Venta from items c group by c.Caja

data.name: sqlDescuentos.SelectCommand
data.value:
;WITH items AS ( select case when d.Tipodescuento ='C' then 'Desc. Cumpl' when d.Tipodescuento ='V' then 'Desc. VIP' when d.Tipodescuento ='D' then 'Desc. Nombr' when d.Tipodescuento ='P' then 'Desc. Promo' when d.Tipodescuento ='S' then 'Desc. Promoción' else ' ' end nombre, d.Valor from Te_descuentos_tiquete d inner join te_tiquetes c on d.idtiquete = c.id where c.Fecha >= @fi and c.Fecha <= @ff and c.Cancelada = 0 and c.Idusuario = @iduaurio and c.Caja = @caja )
select c.nombre, count(*) Transacciones, Sum(c.Valor) Venta from items c group by c.nombre

data.name: sqlImpuestos.SelectCommand
data.value:
;WITH items AS ( select i.nombre tipo, d.Valorcobrado, d.Preciobase from Te_impuestos_tiquete d inner join te_tiquetes c on d.idtiquete = c.id inner join te_impuestos i on d.IdImpuesto = i.id where c.Fecha >= @fi and c.Fecha <= @ff and c.Cancelada = 0 and c.Idusuario = @iduaurio and c.Caja = @caja )
select c.tipo, count(*) Transacciones, Sum(c.Valorcobrado) Impuesto, Sum(c.PrecioBase) BaseImp, Sum(c.ValorCobrado + c.PrecioBase) Compra from items c group by c.tipo

data.name: sqlMediosPago.SelectCommand
sqlBonos.SelectCommand
data.value:
;WITH items AS ( select i.id Consecutivo, i.codigo, c.fecha FechaConsumo, c.numerofactura Factura, i.valor from Te_boletas_tiquete d inner join te_tiquetes c on d.idtiquete = c.id inner join te_bonos i on d.idbono = i.id where c.Fecha >= @fi and c.Fecha <= @ff and c.Cancelada = 0 and c.Idusuario = @iduaurio and c.Caja = @caja and d.idbono is not null )
select Consecutivo, codigo, FechaConsumo, Factura, valor from items c order by Consecutivo

data.name: sqlCortesia.SelectCommand
data.value:
;WITH items AS ( select c.Numerofactura, c.Fecha from Te_boletas_tiquete d inner join te_tiquetes c on d.idtiquete = c.id where c.Fecha >= @fi and c.Fecha <= @ff and c.Cancelada = 0 and c.Idusuario = @iduaurio and c.Caja = @caja and c.escortesia = 1 and d.idtipoprecio is not null )
select c.numerofactura, c.fecha, count(*) cantidad from items c group by c.numerofactura,c.fecha

data.name: sqlCierre.SelectCommand
data.value:
;WITH iniciodia AS ( select Valoriniciodia, Valorterminadia from Te_inicio_dia_usuario c where c.Fecha >= @fi and c.Fecha <= @ff and c.Idusuario = @iduaurio and c.Caja = @caja )
select x.apertura,x.cierre, case when x.efectivo is null then 0 else x.efectivo end efectivo, case when x.bonos is null then 0 else x.bonos end bonos from ( select case when c.Valoriniciodia is null then 0 else c.Valoriniciodia end apertura, case when c.Valorterminadia is null then 0 else c.Valorterminadia end cierre, ( select sum(d.valorpagado) from te_mediospagotiquete d inner join te_tiquetes c on d.idtiquete = c.id inner join te_mediospago i on d.Idmedio = i.id where c.Fecha >= @fi and c.Fecha <= @ff and c.Cancelada = 0 and c.Idusuario = @iduaurio and c.Caja = @caja and i.id = 1 ) efectivo, ( select sum(i.valor) from Te_boletas_tiquete d inner join te_tiquetes c on d.idtiquete = c.id inner join te_bonos i on d.idbono = i.id where c.Fecha >= @fi and c.Fecha <= @ff and c.Cancelada = 0 and c.Idusuario = @iduaurio and c.Caja = @caja and d.idbono is not null ) bonos from iniciodia c ) x
